name: Minute Monet
description:
In Minute Monet, your get to create your very own masterpiece in one minute! Every ten seconds, you will get a new random color. With your trusty cat friend, Tink, you’ll get to sign your artwork too!

Pick your color to start!


Made for Ludum Dare 51, posted here due to the issues w embedding

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/minute-monet

Check out our source code, if you dare: https://github.com/NotoriousENG/ten-second-art-web

  • it’s pretty sketch, we’ve never used phaser before :)
